SEQN.description: Respondent sequence number, serving as a unique identifier for each participant

age_group.description: Grouped age of the participant, categorized as adult or child

value_dict.Adult: Participant is in the adult age group
value_dict.Senior: Participant is in the senior age group

RIDAGEYR.description: Age of the participant in years

RIAGENDR.description: Gender of the participant. 1 for male and 2 for female

PAQ605.description: Physical Activity Indicator. Whether the participant does moderate work or recreational activities

value_dict.2.0: Participant does not engage in moderate work or recreational activities
value_dict.1.0: Participant does engage in moderate work or recreational activities
value_dict.7.0: Data is missing or participant refused to answer

BMXBMI.description: Body Mass Index (BMI) of the participant

DIQ010.description: Diabetes indicator. Whether the participant has diabetes

value_dict.3.0: Data is missing or participant refused to answer

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in health data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the individual health records, please predict the age of the individual.

prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the individual health records, please predict the BMI of the individual.

prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the individual health records, please predict the glucose level.
